nodes.text: Sometime between 3973 BBY and 3965 BBY, during the early years of the conflict known as the Mandalorian Wars, the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders invaded the Galactic Republic's Florn system. The battle followed the capture of the Kaelta system. The Mandalorians were victorious in the Florn system as well, and the raid was the last battle of that particular campaign.
The battle is only referenced once in 2009's The Essential Atlas. It is marked on a galactic map showing the battles of the Mandalorian Wars rather than described in prose.
